package_name: The Smoke that Thunders: Victoria Falls Adventure

places_to_visit.name: Victoria Falls
places_to_visit.description: Victoria Falls is one of the largest and most famous waterfalls in the world, located on the border between Zambia and Zimbabwe. Known locally as 'Mosi-oa-Tunya' or 'The Smoke that Thunders', the falls are over 1.7 kilometers wide and drop approximately 108 meters into the Zambezi Gorge. The falls are a UNESCO World Heritage site and are renowned for their breathtaking views, powerful cascades, and the mist that rises from the crashing waters.

activities: Viewing Victoria Falls from both Zambia and Zimbabwe
Helicopter flight over the falls
Sunset cruise on the Zambezi River
White-water rafting in the Zambezi Gorge
Bungee jumping from the Victoria Falls Bridge
tips_and_tricks: Visit during the dry season (May to October) for clear views of the falls.
Wear waterproof clothing or bring a raincoat when visiting close to the falls.
Carry cash in small denominations for local markets and tips.
